```{r}
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
# Read the HTML content
html_content <- readLines("data/HumanKinases.html")

# Convert character vector to a single string
html_content <- paste(html_content, collapse = "\n")

# Extract the table
html <- read_html(html_content)

# Convert to a data frame
table <- html %>%
  html_table(fill = TRUE)

# Print the data frame
table <- table[[1]]
```
